content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Hello, thank you for considering my apartment for rent. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. Can you please propose a price that you think is fair and reasonable for the size and location of the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to negotiate, but I need to know the minimum price you are willing to accept. [

I am not willing to rent the apartment for less than 500 Euros per month.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Understood. I am happy to negotiate, but my minimum price for renting the apartment is 500 Euros per month. Is that a reasonable price for you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand. I will have to consider it. Thank you for your time.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Of course, I understand that you may need to consider the offer. If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
